person.persName: James Henry Hargis (Coal miner; Private and company clerk (Co. C) in the 55th Kentucky Mounted Infantry)

body.p: A Kentucky coal miner and solider. Born in Pike County, Kentucky. Married to Amanda Hargis. Father of Kenaz F. Hargis and Hebalice Hargis. Served as a private and company clerk (Co. C) in the 55th Kentucky Mounted Infantry from March 1865 to September 1865.
